results.title: Roles of Simvastatin and Sildenafil in Modulation of Cranial Irradiation-Induced Bystander Multiple Organs Injury in Rats.

results.title: Simvastatin Posttreatment Controls Inflammation and Improves Bacterial Clearance in Experimental Sepsis
results.text_hl: Our results showed that posttreatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ hampered @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Organ_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009102 @@@organ dysfunction@@@, increased local production of @CHEMICAL_Nitric_Oxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009569 @@@nitric oxide@@@, improved bacterial clearance, and modulated @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ in a relevant model of @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@.

citations.NLM: de Jesus Oliveira FM, Gonçalves-de-Albuquerque CF, de Moraes IMM, Reis PA, Rocha VN, Bozza PT, Silva AR, de Castro Faria Neto HC. results.title: PPARalpha mediates the anti-inflammatory effect of simvastatin in an experimental model of zymosan-induced multiple organ failure.
results.text_hl: @GENE_PPARA @GENE_19013 @@@PPARalpha@@@ mediates the anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in an experimental model of @CHEMICAL_Zymosan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015054 @@@zymosan@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Organ_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009102 @@@multiple organ failure@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin Improves Neutrophil Function and Clinical Outcomes in Pneumonia. A Pilot Randomized Controlled Clinical Trial
results.journal: Am J Respir Crit Care Med
results.text_hl: Measurements and Main Results: Four days of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ adjuvant therapy in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Communication_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003147 @@@CAP@@@ + S was associated with improvements in systemic neutrophil function (NETosis and chemotaxis), a reduction in systemic @GENE_ELANE @GENE_1991 @@@neutrophil elastase@@@ burden, and improved Sequential @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Organ_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009102 @@@Organ Failure@@@ Assessment scores compared with placebo.

results.title: A randomized clinical trial of hydroxymethylglutaryl- coenzyme a reductase inhibition for acute lung injury (The HARP Study).
results.journal: Am J Respir Crit Care Med
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ appears to be safe and may be associated with an improvement in @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Organ_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009102 @@@organ dysfunction@@@ in @DISEASE_Acute_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055371 @@@ALI@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin and a Plant Galactolipid Protect Animals from Septic Shock by Regulating Oxylipin Mediator Dynamics through the MAPK-cPLA2 Signaling Pathway.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, both dLGG and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ increased the survival rates in the cecal ligation and puncture (CLP) @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@ model.
